description:
Example usage of RUR.extra_python_code

The content of the Onload editor is:

INSERT_ONLOAD

The Pre editor includes a function for you to test the fake extra module:

INSERT_PRE
onload:
# Define a turn_right function that does not
# mess up the leaky trace left by the robot
# while doing a turn in a single frame
python_code = '''
def turn_right():
    r = default_robot()
    r.body._prev_orientation = r.body._orientation
    r.body._prev_x = r.body.x
    r.body._prev_y = r.body.y
    r.body._prev_orientation += 2
    r.body._prev_orientation %= 4
    r.body._orientation += 3
    r.body._orientation %= 4
    RUR.record_frame()
'''
RUR.extra_python_code(python_code)
RUR.onload_set_programming_language("python")
